core.heading: Estimate what you’d get after tax
core.incomeText: Include money you get from work, State Pension and any other taxable income you have. Find out more information on what other income is taxable. (opens in a new window)
core.potText: How much is in your pot?
core.callOutText: If the total value of your pensions, including those you’ve already taken money from, is close to or more than £1 million, your tax-free amount might be different. If you’re in this situation, it’s important to get regulated financial advice before you access your pension. Find a retirement adviser. (opens in a new window)
core.potLabel: If you take your whole £%POT_VALUE% pot in one go, you could get:
core.resultCalculationInfo: This calculation assumes you are entitled to 25% of your total pot as a tax-free lump sum.
core.resultEstimateInfo: This is an estimate — the exact amount of tax you pay depends on your total income for the year and your tax rate.
